comments.comment: Civil and criminal procedure code is the work of lawyers. They make laws, implement them, interpret them, find loopholes, appear for law breakers and often get them exculpated, all  of -course for money. Money can get them to talk. If law is supreme they are also supreme and remain unquestionable. If one criticises them,  it is only a waste of one's precious time, They are incorrigible.. In a way we must 'pity' them because when they pass out of the law college as distinguished qualified lawyers, they are no ready made jobs(not gainfully employable) .They can be 'hired' (retained)  to appear on one's behalf. They  are compelled to fish in  trouble waters for existence or enter the parliament for obvious benefits .

comments.comment:
This actor is showing another version of " one shot one". 
Is he a clean person either in politics or in his famous trade of film industry ?
Instead of barking publicly, show your genuine talents through your behaviour.
Looks like unedited part of "parliment jokes".

comments.comment: soisa kalaknni .ponnaya.ranjan kiyanne .aththa ....thopiwa thamai.issellama ..ellum gas arinna ona.?????thopita aththa kiyanakota....harima amarui neda.....lajja .nadda .janathaweni obalata.....me .serama horu,,,,,kiya.kiya kiyanakota....mumenwa parli menthuwata arinna......me ratata hena hahila thiyenne ,,,lokkage idala sokka wenakam horu,,,,,katakwath ...agilla dik karanna ba serama horu wena karanna deyak na ..........j.v.p........ekata jande dipalla .......mama katath nathuwai ......janathawage illanne....me ,,,,,,,paksa dekema inne....horu,,,,,wena karanna deyak na,,,,,,nathinam wenne ......apita uda balagena innai....ilaga mathiwarnedi. dapalla serama ....j.v.p.......ekat ..nathinam ......ilaga....aurudu 5hak ....yanakota .......lankawe serama denata.....wah kala marennai wenne....hodata hithapalla ........mewa daka daka .....thawath.....denna epa ...????????nathinam api.oyala hamadama ..maha maga ...thank
